actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on woven fabrics containing 85 percent or more by weight of vicuna hair.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on woven fabrics containing 85 percent or more by weight of vicuna hair.

titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on woven fabrics containing 85 percent or more by weight of vicuna hair.
